eheth meki sanwidhana kriyathmaka wuye kesedayi dan anawaranaya wi thibe.widesha katayuthu amathyansha baladharihu aagamana ha wigamana baladharin wetha meki jathyanthara sanwidhanawala ananyathawaya wimarshanaya nokara nirdesha kirime piliwetha binda watune aarakshaka baladharin wetha rahas thorathuru rasak wartha wimeni.atham awasthawala widesha sahana sewakayan yayi handunwagath wideshikayanta aagamana wigamana baladharihu wisa balapath dima prathikshepa kala wita kolambaa jathyanthara sanwidhana jalaye saha owunge deshiya niyojithayo rahas sakachchawak pawathwuha.mehidi thiranaya wuye koti thrasthawadin lawa aagamana wigamana baladharinta tharjanaya karawimayi.

wisheshayen ma ‘gam udawa‘ wani wadasatahanwalata.janadhipathithumage dawase palamu rajakariyaee nisa biya saka nathuwa chayarupa ganna ma pelambauna. 1984 aprel 01 wanida sita premadasa agamathithuma merata widhayaka janadhipathi dhurayata pathwimen pasuwath ethumage nila chayarupa shilpiya bawata pathwenna mata awasthawa labuna.inpasuwa di.bi. wijethunga, chandrika bandaranayaka kumarathunga, mahinda rajapaksha yana janapathiwarunge nila chayarupa shilpiya wune mama.mata me thanathure digatama randi inna awasthawa labune kramanukulawa, awankawa, kapawimen menma ithama wishwasawanthawa wada kala nisa kiyalayi mama hithanne.wisheshayen ma rajya nayakayin asuru karana wita awanka bawa, wishwasawantha bawa ithama awashyayi.
niyojya kathanayaka dhuraya sandaha manthriwarayaku path karaganima sandaha wana rahas chandaya mita sulu mohothakata pera parlimenthuwe di aarambha wiya.
dashaka paha hayaka kalaya gewi yaddi me siyalloma gamata nowadagath sadhakayan wi nikamma nikan minisun bawata pathwi hamaraya.
mama hamadama kale ehemayi...mata hitha sathutin inna puluwan ehemayi....
oyage igenime wada padu nokara nikan inna welawata me paththe awith yanta ennako..

me wathu wawili kshethraye sitina demala janagahanaya 1948 wanawita rate samastha janagahanayen 11.7% k enam 780,000 k dakwa wardhanaya wiya. 1948 di balayata path wu rajayata awashya wuye me pirisa ratin iwath kirimatayi.

parpachuwal tresharis samagame thakshanika pa්radhani sachin dewathantha්ri mahatha ee bawa heli kalath komisame wimarshana katayuthu sidu karana rahas polisiyata sambandhitha niladharinge suwisheshi kapawima ha dakshathawa nisama pa්rashnagatha bandumkara siddhiya wu samaye parpachuwal tresharis samagamata labunu ha in labagath durakathana amathum daththa maka damimata pera laba gath sanskaranaya nokala sanyuktha thati hatharak parpachuwal tresharis samagame pa්radhana ganumkara nuwan salgadu mahatha manginma labaganimata haki wiya.

esema sandhanaye idiri katayuthuwaladi prathipaththimaya thindu thirana sandaha 70% ka kamaththa awashya nowana bawath eya 51%ka bahutharayakin sidukala yuthu bawath, kisiyam ho karunak matha sandhanaye ek parshawayak sambandha winaya kriyamarga ho sandhanayen iwath kirimak sidukirimata awashya wuwa hoth ee sandaha 70%ka bahuthara kamaththa labiya yuthu yayi da mehidi thiranaya kara atha.

mama hithanne umbaa meka nirdeshapalanikawa liwwoth eeke umbaata oona watinakama mathuwenawa kiyalayi.mokada kiyanawa nam umbaa meka sadbhawayen liwwa wenna puluwan.namuth mama dakina samaharu innawa, (aththatama unta samaharak kiyannada pinguththarayo kiyannada kiyala mata prashnayak thiyenawa) ee wage umbaalama kiyana podi deyak ahuwechcha gaman umbaalama keruwa meheya ballagenuth pahalata dana.samaharu hithan innawa eeka radikal wima, udugan bala yama kiyala..ee gana prasiddhiye piligaththath nathath umbaala dannawa kiyalath hithanawa..
eeken siduwune shailok papuwe mas raththalama illa sitinawa wage ratata hena gahuwath thamange jathiyata aagamata pamanak wasi wena dewal illagena aandu pihitawana eka.
eka kotasak ingrisn yatathe dhanawath wu engalanthaye ihala adhyapanayak lada wamanshika adahas ha radikal adahas athi usas kalawata ladi, usas sahithyata ladi.

ehemath nathinam samiya biridata wada wasara 8-10 wadimal unoth.ehema unoth loku gatalu athiwenawa.samiyath biridath parampara dekaka kelawarawal dekak.samiya parani adahas darannek birida aluth adahas daranek.owunge wayasa paratharaya nisa owunge adahas,sithum pathum pamanak neweyi an hama deyakma paraspara wiya hakiyi.udaharanayak lesa mehema hithanna.biridata wada wasara 8-10 wadimal un samiya kamathi sinduwakata birida kamathi weyida.naha aya wasara 8-10 nawinayi.ee wagemayi birida kamathi githayata samiya akamathi wiya hakiyi.dedenage siyaluma adahas ese wenas,nogalapim wiya hakiyi.ee nisa ee kramayath asarthaka wiwaha jiwithayakata hethuwak.
